meanings.definition: Not specific or characteristic of any particular individual
meanings.sent1: The store sold generics items that were not unique.
meanings.sent2: She preferred generics clothing that didn't stand out.
meanings.sent3: His generics taste in music made him blend in everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The generics landscape seemed to lack any defining features.
meanings.sent5: The generics color of the walls made the room feel plain and unremarkable.

meanings.definition: A product that is not branded or trademarked
meanings.sent1: The supermarket offered a variety of generics at lower prices.
meanings.sent2: He decided to buy the generics instead of the expensive brand.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the generics cereal tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent4: The generics soda had a surprisingly refreshing taste.
meanings.sent5: The generics medication was just as effective as the name brand.

meanings.definition: A class of pharmaceuticals that are not protected by a trademark
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed generics to save on costs.
meanings.sent2: Many people opt for generics to reduce their medical expenses.
meanings.sent3: He found humor in the generics pills looking plain and unexciting.
meanings.sent4: The generics drugs provided the same benefits without the high price.
meanings.sent5: The generics medication was a lifesaver for those on a budget.
